quote_last: hours from a distance of 500 metres. Again it missed its intended target, but exploded seven minutes later. The torpedos would only detonate on contact with a solid object.
title: Goldfinder
author: Keith Jessop and Neil Hanson

quote_last: “Hold your fire! Goddammit, hold your fire.” The SEAL leader, Lieutenant Devon Robbins, was pressing in his earpiece, incredulous at what he was hearing.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover
